name: podondra site
body:
### Welcome

Hi. I'm just a student of computer science. I live in [Houdkovice](https://goo.gl/maps/osPkehiYgjR2), Czech Republic.

### [Bachelor Thesis Intro](bp-intro)

Presentation introduction to my bachelor thesis. Spectra analysis of Be stars using Deep learning.

### [Linear Generators](/linear-generator)

Seminar paper about code optimization. Code is vectorized. Several loop optimization techniques are used. OpenMP is used for parallel execution. Some cache usage analysis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
